# sl753ps

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

sl753ps is a collection of utility functions for the class 753PS at UMass Amherst, spring 2022. *sl* is the author's initials.

## Installation

You can install the development version of sl753ps from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("stevelinberg/sl753ps")
```
